SELECT * FROM (WITH "information_periods_\d+_1_\w+" AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT * FROM (SELECT "person_id" AS "person_id", "observation_period_id" AS "criterion_id", CAST('observation_period' AS text) AS "criterion_table", CAST('observation_period' AS text) AS "criterion_domain", CAST("observation_period_start_date" AS date) AS "start_date", CAST(coalesce("observation_period_end_date", "observation_period_start_date") AS date) AS "end_date", CAST(NULL AS text) AS "source_value", CAST(NULL AS text) AS "source_vocabulary_id", CAST(NULL AS text) AS "label" FROM "observation_period") AS "t1") SELECT * FROM "information_periods_\d+_1_\w+") AS "t1"
